allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=treasury_pass psql -h postgres -U treasury_user -d treasury_db -c "SELECT * FROM treasury.migration_metadata;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=treasury_pass psql -h postgres -U treasury_user -d treasury_db -c "SELECT * FROM treasury.migration_metadata ORDER BY version DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=treasury_pass psql -h postgres -U treasury_user -d treasury_db -c "SELECT * FROM treasury.schema_migrations;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=treasury_pass psql -h postgres -U treasury_user -d treasury_db -c "\dt treasury.*")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=treasury_pass psql -h postgres -U treasury_user -d treasury_db -c "SELECT code, name, country_code, institution_type FROM treasury.financial_institutions;")
